dct_description_sm: "An imaginary view of the destruction of Jerusalem shows the temple ablaze."--Laor.
"Foliu LXIIII" from Liber Cronicarum commonly called Nuremberg Chronicle.
Illustrations by Michael Wohlgemur [sic] and Wilhelm Pleydenwurff.--Armstrong.
On verso: text in Latin and illustrations of people. "Foliu LXIII."
Map is cut in wood by Michael Wohlgemut per Laor.
